Home Again

08 October 2005

I'm back from the US today and looking forward to a good night's sleep tonight. The flight home was quickened by a 100mph tail wind, which was good. That's all I have the energy to write really, it's been a long day.

Hope you're well.

Paul May is a researcher and designer from Dublin, living and working in New York. Find out more about Paul's work or get in touch.
